actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the inclusion in the Office of the Under Secretary for Health of the Department of Veterans' Affairs of health care personnel appointed to positions in the Veterans' Health Administration.

summary.text: Provides for the inclusion of health care personnel appointed to positions in the Veterans Health Administration within the Office of the Under Secretary for Health of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the inclusion in the Office of the Under Secretary for Health of the Department of Veterans' Affairs of health care personnel appointed to positions in the Veterans' Health Administration.
